body_html:
Also, can you also expose all the other properties (at least those that are easy to expose, like integer values)?

There's helluva bunch of fields in there (almost 100?). I don't think we should have all of those, especially those that are about textures.
http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-runtime-api/structcudaDeviceProp.html

The ones that seem useful are:

  • name
  • major
  • minor
  • isMultiGpuBoard
  • integrated
  • multiProcessorCount
  • totalGlobalMem

and I now have included all of them.

body:
>Also, can you also expose all the other properties (at least those that are easy to expose, like integer values)?

There's helluva bunch of fields in there (almost 100?). I don't think we should have all of those, especially those that are about textures.
http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-runtime-api/structcudaDeviceProp.html

The ones that seem useful are:
* name
* major
* minor
* isMultiGpuBoard
* integrated
* multiProcessorCount
* totalGlobalMem

and I now have included all of them.
